Thank you for using GoalAlert!
We regularly provide updates to improve our app. If you like GoalAlert we would be very pleased about a positive review. We would be glad to receive suggestions for improvement by e-mail at support@toralarm.com.

Thank you for using GoalAlert!
We regularly provide updates to improve our app. If you like GoalAlert we would be very pleased about a positive review. We would be glad to receive suggestions for improvement by e-mail at support@goal-alert.com.

GoalAlert gets new, useful features - don’t worry, we will stay simple and clear!
-Goal scorer list
-Team lineup
-Live statistics for each game (goal shots, possession of the ball etc.)
-“Today“ - View all the games of today at a glance

The new functions are optional, if you don’t want to use them, nothing changes for you!

We always try to respond to your wishes and improve GoalAlert continuously.  If you like the app, we would appreciate a comment and a review.
You can send suggestions and problems via the support area in the settings of the app or via support@goal-alert.com.

We always try to respond to your wishes and improve GoalAlert continuously. If you have any suggestions or problems feel free to contact us via the support section in the app's settings or with a mail to support@toralarm.eu.
Hey fans, with this update we fixed some bugs, so the app will run even better in the future!

Hey fans!

With our newest update, we have made technical adjustments to the live animation, the info-cards in the match-details, and notifications.

Moreover, various things regarding VoiceOver have been optimized.

We hope you enjoy the new version!

Your GoalAlert-Team

Hey fans, with this update we've made some improvements for iOS 13.

If you like the app, we would appreciate a comment, review and recommendation to your friends.
We always try to respond to your wishes and improve GoalAlert continuously. If you have any suggestions or problems feel free to contact us via the support section in the app's settings or with a mail to support@toralarm.eu.

Dear fans,

we used the Corona break and updated our app to a new version. We are especially happy to announce that we now support the dark mode. If you have enabled it on your mobile phone, it will be set directly in the app.

Furthermore, we have, as usual, fixed some bugs.

We wish you a lot of fun with our latest version.
Your GoalAlert-Team

Hello fans,

Summer break means preparation time. Now the most important thing is to lay a proper foundation. While the teams are working hard on the training grounds, we have made some bug fixes on our side, because without certain foundations a successful season is not possible.

We are happy that the season will start again soon.

Your TorAlarm Team

Hey fans, with this update we made some improvements, so the app will run even more smooth in the future. Furthermore we implement an extend table button above the standings. So for now you could see more informations in the table view if you want.

Enjoy!
Your GoalAlert team

5.1.1:

different bugfixes

5.1.0:

Hey fans,

with this update we made some improvements, so the app will run even more smooth in the future. Furthermore we implement an extend table button above the standings. So for now you could see more informations in the table view if you want.

Enjoy!
Your GoalAlert team

Hi fans,

we have extended our league overview and the today view according to your wishes.
Now you have more options: For example, you can now switch between the views of "Yesterday", "Today" and "Tomorrow".
We have also made some minor optimizations and fixes.

Enjoy!
Your TorAlarm Team
Hey fans, with this update we made some improvements, so the app will run even more smooth in the future.

Dear football fans!

this update introduces GoalAlert Premium, a subscription which unlocks exclusive features. In the app's settings you can find out about all the perks of going Premium.
If you are excited about the new features, you can try out GoalAlert Premium and support the development of our app.

Your Team GoalAlert
Hey fans, with this update we fixed some bugs, so the app will run even better in the future!
Hey fans, with this update we fixed some bugs, so the app will run even better in the future!

Hi fans,

with the latest update you will get even more information at first glance. On our brand new home view you get access to what matters the most: favourite leagues and today's games.

Enjoy!
Your GoalAlert team
